scripts.commit-built: git add build -A && git commit -m "build files at `date`" -n > /dev/null 2>&1; exit 0
scripts.ghpages: git subtree split --prefix build/ -b gh-pages && git push -f origin gh-pages:gh-pages && git branch -D gh-pages
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run commit-built && npm run ghpages
